transportAdvice: Buenos Aires has an extensive public transit network including a metro (subte), buses, and commuter trains that cover most tourist areas well. Taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available, and many central neighborhoods like Palermo and San Telmo are very walkable.

weather.description: Hot and humid summer month with occasional afternoon thunderstorms; one of the warmest times of year.
Still hot and humid with similar conditions to January; thunderstorms remain common in the afternoons.
Late summer brings slightly cooler temperatures but humidity remains high with frequent rain.
Autumn arrives with pleasant, mild temperatures and decreasing humidity; a comfortable time to visit.
Cooler autumn weather sets in with occasional rain; light layers are recommended for evenings.
Winter begins with cool, dry conditions; cold fronts can bring brief chilly spells but snow is very rare.
The coldest month of the year with dry, crisp conditions; a coat is essential especially at night.
Late winter with gradually warming days; still cool but dry and generally pleasant for sightseeing.
Spring arrives with warming temperatures and increasing rainfall; jacaranda trees begin to bloom.
Lovely spring weather with mild temperatures and blooming parks; one of the best months to visit.
Warm and lively with longer days; humidity begins to rise and afternoon storms become more frequent.
Hot early summer with high humidity and occasional thunderstorms; the city buzzes with festive energy.
